Class NxtUltrasonicSensor

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class NxtUltrasonicSensor
extends Sensor
    Class that represents a NXT ultrasonic sensor.

        triggerLevel - the trigger level where the callback is triggered

      • addUltrasonicListener

      • getDistance

        public int getDistance()
        Polls the sensor.
        Returns:
        the current value the sensor reported (in cm), 255 if the sensor does not detect a target.
